task.title: Create a classification hierarchy
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to create a classification hierarchy.

step.cmd: Click Edit Settings > Conversion > Classification Hierarchies.
From the Build Hierarchy For drop-down list, select the variable where you want to create a classification hierarchy.

stepresult.p: The classifications list automatically displays the classifications available for the selected variable.

step.cmd: Drag a classification into the Drag new hierarchy root here field to include it in the classification hierarchy.

stepresult.p: Drag classifications into the hierarchy in the order that you want them to appear in the hierarchy. The first classification is the hierarchy root, the second classification is the first subclassification, and so on.
